overview: Ganaa and Solongo have been married for 10 years but they still don’t have a child. It seems like their life is not complete without a child. One day Ganaa leaves the town for a business trip. While he is gone, Solongo goes to fortune teller with her friend Odko. Fortune teller told Solongo that her last chance of having a baby is before she reaches 33 years old, which is in 4 days. Now Solongo has to choose between going after her husband or follow the advice of Odko, finding an another guy to have a baby.
title: I Want To Become A Mother
